bibl.title: Rome - Meroe - Berlin. The Southernmost Latin Inscription Rediscovered (CIL III 83).
bibl.note: Revised edition of C.I.L. III, 83, a Latin graffito left by a visitor at the Meroitic temple site of Musawwarat es-Sufra (Sudan), considered lost for more than a century, now identified as: Skulpturensammlung und Museum für Byzantinische Kunst, Staatliche Museen zu Berlin - Stiftung Preussischer Kulturbesitz, Inv. 9675. 3rd-4th cent. A.D.
bibl.seg: LAJTAR Adam and Jacques VAN DER VLIET, Rome - Meroe - Berlin. The Southernmost Latin Inscription Rediscovered (CIL III 83).

Revised edition of C.I.L. III, 83, a Latin graffito left by a visitor at the Meroitic temple site of Musawwarat es-Sufra (Sudan), considered lost for more than a century, now identified as: Skulpturensammlung und Museum für Byzantinische Kunst, Staatliche Museen zu Berlin - Stiftung Preussischer Kulturbesitz, Inv. 9675. 3rd-4th cent. A.D.
